refnamediv.refpurpose: Set the field of a Java object

listitem.para: A mlist typed _JObj or _JClass or a Scilab variable
A string giving the field name
A Scilab variable or mlist typed _JObj as new field value

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Set the field named fieldName to the given value.
This function also works with beans properties which may not be mapped to a public java field.

refsection.title: Examples

revision.revremark: Function introduced. Based on the 'JIMS' module. The main difference in the behavior compared to the JIMS module is that jautoUnwrap is enabled by default.
